<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.RankDebugUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>RankDebugUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RankDebugUtil = Class.create();
RankDebugUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    type: 'RankDebugUtil'
};

RankDebugUtil.logMsg = function(message) {
    var debugValue = gs.getProperty("com.snc.sldc.ranking.debug", "false");
    if((debugValue && debugValue == "true") || GlideSessionDebug.isDebugging("log")){
        gs.info(message);
    }
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-12-19 06:58:22</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>874c26329f830300730e5bb0657fcfd8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RankDebugUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global Ranking Application" source="com.snc.sdlc.ranking">a4451b642fc10110d8a4d5f62799b679</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_874c26329f830300730e5bb0657fcfd8</sys_update_name>
